thread.title: Tennis: Tsonga stops Nadal to reach Shanghai Masters final - Omni Sports - Sports
thread.title_full: Tennis: Tsonga stops Nadal to reach Shanghai Masters final - Omni Sports - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Tennis: Tsonga stops Nadal to reach Shanghai Masters final - Omni Sports - Sports
text:
Related Tennis: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals Tennis: Nadal says getting to grips with 'mental injury' Tennis: Djokovic humbles Nadal to extend Beijing dynasty Tennis: Djokovic destroys Ferrer to set up Nadal final Jo-Wilfried Tsonga reached only his second final of the year after upsetting Rafael Nadal 6-4, 0-6, 7-5 at the Shanghai Masters on Saturday.
After breaking Nadal to go up 6-5 in the third, Tsonga got to match point with a diving volley that clipped the baseline and then won when Nadal dumped a backhand into the net.
Nadal had been attempting to reach back-to-back finals following his run last week at the China Open in Beijing, where he lost to Novak Djokovic.
Tsonga, seeded 16th, had not reached a final this season until capturing the Open de Moselle title last month in his native France.
The top-seeded Djokovic plays Andy Murray later Saturday in the other semifinal.
(For more sports news and updates, follow Ahram Online Sports on Twitter at @AO_Sports and on Facebook at AhramOnlineSports .)
